subject: Baby monitors?
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

One of my readers asked me what I thought about using a baby monitor for EVP.  Apparently there's one that gets poor reviews at Amazon because it seems to pick up voices from nowhere.

That sounds like a good candidate for EVP, etc... no pun intended.

I wanted to see if anyone on this list had talked about this, but Yahoo Groups' search form isn't working.

Has this been discussed? Tested?  

Opinions?

Cheerfully,
Fiona
